TopicTitle: a new mod under development and help wanted

Articles.Content:
So i want to create a new mod but i dont have much experience so if you want help me email me: [email protected]

 

 

 

¡PLEASE HELP ME :)!

WITH THE TOPIC OF: I want to help

 

 

¡REMEMBER I HAVE NO MONEY SO YOU WILL BE WORKING FOR FREE!

You'll probably have more luck if you specify what kind of mod you want to make and what kind of help you need. Bonus points for showing that you've made an effort to find and understand the existing modding resources that are stickied in the forum.
a bd addon that rescue old parts
of old bda addons and soviet and old stuff
